feed.title: Howardmore
feed.subtitle: A collection of my thoughts and ideas related to my professional work.

entry.title: Welcome to my site!
entry.content: I’ve been encouraged for a while now to collect my thoughts and ideas and share them online. I’ll be using this site to publish my thoughts and ideas. Stay tuned!
entry.summary: I’ve been encouraged for a while now to collect my thoughts and ideas and share them online. I’ll be using this site to publish my thoughts and ideas. Stay tuned!
